subject: Mascots
Basketball
Suits and Litigation
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: University of Illinois student Dan Maloney, a.k.a. Chief Illiniwek, is suing the university’s board of trustees and the N.C.A.A. for discontinuing a tradition that goes back more than 80 years.
snippet: University of Illinois student Dan Maloney, a.k.a. Chief Illiniwek, is suing the university’s board of trustees and the N.C.A.A. for discontinuing a tradition that goes back more than 80 years.
